original_title: まほろば<土恋いのうた>の主題より
overview: Nobuhiko Obayashi's 2001 work "From the theme of Mahoroba". Obayashi filmed the works of Genjiro Ohno, a photographer who has been photographing the landscapes and people of Akita Prefecture for over 10 years.
title: From the theme of Mahoroba "Doi Koinouta"
